channel.title: acoustic variometer on Airspace
channel.description: Recent content in acoustic variometer on Airspace

item.title: App install prerrequisites
item.description: The philosophy behind this app is to replace the visual interaction with your device by audible interaction made of sounds and voice messages. Therefore you won’t need to take your phone in sight during the flight or keep the screen on, which brings freedom (no cockpit) and battery life (screen on drains lots of battery power) to your flights.
